short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Product Hunt notifier. Get notified when a new product appears on Product Hunt

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hunt Notifier checks every 10 minutes if new products have been added to Product Hunt and sends you a notification.
You can also view the number of new products added in the icon badge on the main toolbar.
